column4: is there a way to compile and install ffmpeg myself without having aptitude clobber it or throw up when installing something that depends on libavcodec52 or whatnot?
I recently installed ffmpeg via aptitude and never got such issues.

if I install ffmpeg and libavcodec/libavformat/etc. via ffmpeg, then there is no problem....., however, if i install ffmpeg and the associated libraries from source, then installing, say mplayer, from the repositories is going to throw up saying i don't have yaddyyaaddy libraries
I just installed all from the repos along with the ffmpeg gui winff. All working fine here.
